item.title: About Josh
item.author: j@joshix.com (Josh Wood)
item.description: j@joshix.com ยง @joshixisjosh9 ยง github.com/joshix ยง speakerdeck.com/joshix Man about machines. Tech maker, breaker, writer. Enjoys photographing polydactyl cats and writing short autobiographies. Developer Advocate, Red Hat Former DocOps, CoreOS Licit cannabis industry software pioneer; former Chief Technology Officer, Agrisoft Cofounder, Utopian.net: Making the web easy for artists (now a John Companies property) Janitor, Illustration Friday: Creative project Projects, etc. The Eclectilepsy
